alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 5:39AM AKST until January 28 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT FOR WEST AND NORTHWEST OF KING SALMON... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. Total ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch to locally two-tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, areas west and northwest of King Salmon, including Koliganek and Dillingham. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will transition to freezing rain in the afternoon, then to plain rain overnight. Highest ice accumulations are expected near Dillingham and along the eastern slope of the Kuskokwim Mountains, including Aleknagik and Manokotak.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
